alert.note: Alert for Pickens (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 10:28PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Pickens County through 1100 PM CDT... At 1028 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Memphis, or 10 miles west of Aliceville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Aliceville, Carrollton, Pickensville, Memphis, McMullen, Garden, Johnston Lake, Gainesville Lake Campground, Owens, Dillburg, Cochrane and George Downer Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
